description:
Now that summer vacation has started, Chizuru wants to play, but Yuki and Kaname won`t hang out with him. At Shun`s suggestion, they invite the boys and Masaki to a summer festival. Masaki acts rudely to an excited Chizuru. Unimpressed be her behavior, Chizuru noticing something in her expression toward Shun.
Source: crunchyroll
